mapper.select: SELECT board.board_no boardNo, board.writer as writer, board.title as title, to_char(board.board_date,'YYYY/MM/DD') as boardDate FROM (SELECT rownum as rnum,board_no,writer,title,board_Date FROM (SELECT board_no,writer,title,board_Date from board where board_state='shuttle' and location='P' order by board_no+0 desc) ) board where rnum BETWEEN ((#{curPage}-1)*10)+1 AND #{curPage}*10
select count(board_no) from board where board_state='shuttle' and location='P'
SELECT * FROM BOARD WHERE board_state='shuttle' and location='P' and board_no=#{boardNo} and password=#{password}
mapper.delete: DELETE FROM BOARD WHERE BOARD_NO=${boardNo} AND board_state='shuttle' location='P'
mapper.update: UPDATE BOARD SET writer=#{writer},content=#{content},board_date=sysdate, password=#{password},phone=#{phone},kakao_id=#{kakaoId} WHERE BOARD_NO=${boardNo} AND board_state='shuttle' location='P'
